original_text: Also, when God said that Jesus would be his special priest, he made a strong promise. When the Levites became priests, he did not make a strong promise like that.
korean_text: 또 예수께서 제사장이 되신 것은 맹세 없이 된 것이 아니니

sentences.original_text: that Jesus would be his special priest
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님이 그의 특별한 제사장이 될 것이라고

sentences.original_text: he did not make a strong promise like that
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그런 강력한 약속을 하지 않으셨습니다
